title: Generate 3D assets and textures for Prism Digital
description:
Create or source 3D assets for the particles scene.

## Assets Needed
- Environment map / HDRI for lighting
- Textures (noise, gradients, matcaps)
- Optional: GLTF models if product-focused
- Particle sprites if using particles

## Sources
- Poly Haven (free HDRIs)
- Use procedural generation where possible
- DALL-E for texture generation via TabzArtist

title: Project scaffolding - Next.js + React Three Fiber
description:
Initialize Next.js 15+ with React Three Fiber and supporting packages.

## Commands
```bash
npx create-next-app@latest . --typescript --tailwind --app --src-dir
npm install three @react-three/fiber @react-three/drei @react-three/postprocessing
npm install gsap @gsap/react leva
npm install -D @types/three
npx shadcn@latest init
```

## Configure
- Add `transpilePackages: ['three']` to next.config.js
- Set up path aliases
close_reason: Scaffolded Next.js 15 with R3F, GSAP, and shadcn/ui. Build verified.

title: GSAP ScrollTrigger integration
description:
Wire up all scroll animations with GSAP.

## Tasks
- Install and configure ScrollTrigger
- Connect scroll position to R3F scene state
- Smooth scrolling with Lenis or native
- Pin sections as needed
- Scrub animations to scroll progress

## Performance
- Use will-change sparingly
- Batch DOM reads/writes
- Test on low-end devices

title: Performance optimization
description:
Optimize for smooth 60fps experience.

## Checks
- Geometry instancing where applicable
- Texture compression and sizing
- Lazy load off-screen content
- useFrame optimization (avoid creating objects)
- Dispose geometries/materials on unmount
- Reduce draw calls

## Tools
- Use Leva to toggle features for debugging
- Chrome DevTools Performance tab
- drei's `<PerformanceMonitor>`

title: Mobile responsive adaptation
description:
Ensure excellent mobile experience.

- Touch-friendly interactions
- Responsive typography and spacing
- Test on real devices

## Fallbacks
- Detect WebGL support
- Provide static fallback if needed
